steps.plaintext: Look for the submerged caveSubmerged cave locationAdditional context
steps.markdown: Look for the submerged cave◀▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/File:World_Quest_Royinjan%27s_Chapter_Linga_Start_Location.png▷Submerged cave location◀▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/File:World_Quest_Royinjan%27s_Chapter_Linga_Start_Location_Context.png▷Additional context

substeps.plaintext: Guide the two Seelies in the cave to unlock the device.
substeps.markdown: Guide the two ◀Seelies▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Seelie▷ in the cave to unlock the device.

substeps.plaintext: The first Seelie is in the middle of the lake. Use the Four-Leaf Sigil to get to it.
substeps.markdown: The first Seelie is in the middle of the lake. Use the ◀Four-Leaf Sigil▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Four-Leaf_Sigil▷ to get to it.

substeps.plaintext: The second Seelie is one floor below the device.
substeps.markdown: The second Seelie is one floor below the device.

substeps.plaintext: This step is skipped if the water level was lowered before starting the quest.
substeps.markdown: This step is skipped if the water level was lowered before starting the quest.

substeps.plaintext: Use the Dendrograna and make Charged Attacks at the Floating Dendro Puzzles to unseal the Dendro Monuments. Activate the three Dendro Monuments quickly to unlock the device.
substeps.markdown: Use the ◀Dendrograna▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Dendrogranum▷ and make ◀Charged Attacks▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Charged_Attacks▷ at the Floating Dendro Puzzles to unseal the ◀Dendro Monuments▶◁https://genshin-impact.fandom.com/wiki/Elemental_Monument▷. Activate the three Dendro Monuments quickly to unlock the device.
